p: The future monthly TN and TP loads showed similar trends with streamflow, the tendency of increasing and decreasing will occur in the months. It showed that will decrease from March to November but increase from December to February, and the most decreasing occur in March, April, July and August. This is because the increase of snowmelt flow from December to February, so TN and TP loads will increase with the runoff into channel, and decrease obviously in March, April, July and August.
